Translations.Text: Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong pu ci de, te ci de zhu [an la] jiang shi de.
Dui you zhishi de minzhong, zhe shi yi bu jing wen jieshi xiangjin de jingdian, shi yi bu alabo wen de “gulanjing”,
ke zuo baoxi zhe [xinshi jin leyuan] he jinggao zhe [bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu], dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi beili, haishi bu tingcong.

Tamen shuo:“Duiyu ni suo zhaohuan women [xinyang] de, women de xin bei mengbile, women de er shi long dun de, women he ni zhi jian you yidao pingzhang [gezhe], suoyi, ni zuo ni de ba! Women zuo women de.”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo suo feng dao de qishi shi:“Nimen ying chongbai de zhu, zhishi du yi de zhu [an la].” Suoyi, nimen dang zunxing tong xiang ta de zheng dao [bing shuncong ta], dang qiu ta kuanshu.” Bai ouxiang zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] bu jiaona tian ke [zhu], bu xinyang houshi.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen jiang huode yongheng de baochou [leyuan].
